Uses of Interface
gov.sandia.cognition.text.term.TermIndex

  • Packages that use TermIndex 
    Package Description
    gov.sandia.cognition.text.term
    Provides term representing text content in documents.
    gov.sandia.cognition.text.term.relation
    Provides relationships between terms.
    gov.sandia.cognition.text.term.vector
    Provides methods for handling documents represented as term vectors.

    • Uses of TermIndex in gov.sandia.cognition.text.term

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractTermIndex
      An abstract implementation of the TermIndex class that handles a lot of the convenience method implementations.
      class  DefaultTermIndex
      A default implementation of the TermIndex interface.
